comment.body:
Hi AdamWR.
Sorry about this, but I am desperate not to get this chance wasted.

Could you or someone else please look into this issue:
https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/182200

Since you have responded in a timely manner to my issues, I thought I'd alert you because I don't want the issue to be closed again with being fixed this time.

Thanks in advance, and I apologise for any inconvenience.
